useCase.name: Request access to a service offered by a delegate

preconditions.precondition: Administrator requests access to a service

successEndConditions.condition: Access request is approved and access grants are displayed

useCase.trigger: Administrator requests access to a service

mainSequence.step: Administrator requests access to a service
Management UI receives access request
Management API processes access request
Inway receives access request
Management API stores access request in Management Database
Administrator views pending access requests
Management UI retrieves pending access requests
Management API retrieves pending access requests from Management Database
Management Database returns pending access requests to Management API
Management API returns pending access requests to Management UI
Administrator approves access request
Management UI approves access request
Inway creates access grant
Management API stores access grant in Management Database
Administrator views access grants for service
Management UI retrieves access grants for service
Inway retrieves access grants for service
Management API retrieves access grants for service from Saas Organization
Management Database returns access grants for service to Management API
Management API returns access grants for service to Management UI
Management UI displays access grants for service
